## divide variable

Divide input two arguments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
divide: {
    (a: number, b: number): number;
    (a: number): (b: number) => number;
    (a: bigint, b: bigint): bigint;
    (a: bigint): (b: bigint) => bigint;
}
```

## Remarks

Note that when use curry, divide second argument from first argument.

## Example 1


```ts
// Basic
divide(10, 100) // 0.1

```

## Example 2


```ts
// Bigint
divide(100n, 100n) // 1n

```

## Example 3


```ts
// Curry
const half = divide(2)
half(20) // 10

```
